options.name: Dusk Forged
options.description:
The bearer must reroll its failed Armour Saves.

The bearer automatically fails all Special Saves,
regardless of whether Using the Shield or not.

options.name: Legend of the Black King
options.description: +1 Arm, Aegis(4+).

options.name: Death Cheater
options.description: +1 Arm, and Regeneration(4+).

options.name: Ghostly Guard
options.description: +2 Arm against non-Magical Attacks.

options.name: Black Standard of Zagvozd
options.description: /subsection{black_standard_of_zagvozd}

options.name: Banner of Eldritch Might
options.description:
Each turn, if the unit has been a target of at least one successfully cast friendly spell it gains Fight in Extra Rank with Duration: One Turn.

In addition, during your Magic Phase, all spells targeting only the bearer’s unit gain a +1 modifier to their Casting Rolls.

options.name: Banner of Speed
options.description: A unit containing one or more Banner of Speed gains +1" Charge Speed and Mobility.

options.name: Reaper's Harvest
options.description: Str is set to 10, AP is set to 10, Divine Attacks,Psychic Attacks.

options.name: True Thirst
options.description:
+1 Str, +1 AP, Unholy Appetite, Vampiric(3+).

If the wielder’s model has Height 4 or 5 , the wielder gains Vampiric(5+) instead of Vampiric(3+).

options.name: Supernatural Dexterity
options.description: +3 Def and +3 Off.

options.name: Eldritch Inscriptions
options.description: First Strike(Hatred and Zeal).

options.name: Necromantic Staff
options.description: The wielder gains Channel(1), and can cast Arise! (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell(5+), with the following changes : Range is set to 6", and it gains the Type: Aura.

options.name: Hypnotic Pendant
options.description: The wearer and all Rank-and-File models with Height 1--2 in its unit gain Parry.

options.name: Eternity Gem
options.description: The bearer’s model gains Immune(Lethal Strike). When the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds(X), reduce the number of wounds suffered by 1, to a minimum of 1.

options.name: Night's Crown
options.description: Attacks against the bearer suffer -1 to-wound.

options.name: Cursed Medallion
options.description:
During Pre-game Selections, choose a single model unit on the opponent’s Army List (remember: all Characters are single model units).

The wearer gains Hatred(chosen model), Zeal(chosen model).

options.name: Mask of Mindless Violence
options.description:
Rage.
All Melee Attacks made by or against the wearer gain +1 to hit.

options.name: Rod of Battle
options.description:
The bearer can cast a unique Bound Spell:
Rod of Battle: Casting Value (4+)
Type: Range 18", Augment.

Duration: One Turn.

Effect: The target’s Melee Attacks gains +1 to hit.

options.name: Obsidian Rock
options.description: Magic Resistance(2).

options.name: Lahmia
options.description:
Models without Shield only
The bearer’s Armour is set to 1, it gains Elven Finesse and loses Metal Armour. Additionally, if the model is of Height 1--2, it gains Distracting (1).

options.name: Strigoi
options.description:
Wizard Apprentice or Wizard Adept without Shield and on Shrieking Horror or without Mount only
The bearer’s Armour is set to 0, its HP are set to 4, it gains First Strike (Hatred) and loses Metal Armour. Additionally, if it is without Mount, it gains Regeneration (4+).

options.name: Sangreal
options.description:
Wizard Apprentice and Wizard Adept only
The model part gains +1 Arm and Fury.

options.name: Vetala
options.description: The bearer gains Disciplined, Unholy Conduit, Vampiric (4+), Awaken (Bat Swarms, Dire Wolves, Great Bats, Zombies).

options.name: Blood Magic
options.description:
The bearer cannot know the Hereditary Spell, or have it as a Bound Spell, in any way.
Each time the bearer successfully casts a Learned Spell, you may discard one Magic Dice to successfully cast Arise!, targeting only the bearer’s unit.

options.name: Ghoul Lord
options.description:
Vampire Counts with Strigoi only
The bearer and all Rank-and-File models in the bearer’s unit gain Poison Attacks.

options.name: Commandment
options.description:
Vampire Counts with Lahmia only
The Defensive Skill and Offensive Skill of Rank-and-File models in the bearer’s unit are set to 6.

options.name: Crimson Rage
options.description:
Vampire Counts with Sangreal only
The bearer gains Hatred, and its Vampiric rolls gain Maximised.

options.name: Storm Caller
options.description: Storm Caller

options.name: Arcane Knowledge
options.description:
Wizards only
The bearer selects a second Path of Magic it knows one spell from this Path, in addition to its other spells, selected from the Apprentice Spell or Adept Spells (#1-#4), and is otherwise not allowed to choose spells from this Path.
Ignore this Path for the purpose of Gates of the Netherworld.

options.name: Eternal Duellist
options.description: The bearer’s Melee Attacks ignore Parry, and must re-roll to-hit and to-wound rolls of ‘1’.

options.name: Monster Hunter
options.description: The bearer gains Multiple Wounds (2, towards Height 4--5).

options.name: Flying Horror
options.description:
Models without Mount only
The model gains +2" Cha, +2" Mob, Fly, Swiftstride.

options.name: Unbreakable Will
options.description: When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, select a single friendly unit Engaged in the same Combat as the bearer (this can be its own unit): this unit gains Stubborn. Duration: End of Turn.

options.name: Bestial Bulk
options.description:
Without Mount only
The model’s Height is changed to 3, its base size is changed to 40×40mm, it gains Unholy Appetite, and +1 Res.

options.name: Mesmerising Gaze
options.description:
The bearer gains Afflict (-1 Att, -1 Off).
Only Character models are affected by this instance of Afflict.

options.name: Mysteries of the Night
options.description:
Wizard Apprentice or Wizard Adept only
The bearer’s Path access is replaced with Shamanism, Witchcraft.

options.name: General, Disciplined, and The Dead Arise
The Collective of Varyag the Sainted
